title: ISAIAH 13: 12-16, PART THREE
content:
ISAIAH 13: 12-16, PART THREE

In this post, I will cover Isaiah 13:12-16

You will find that studying Scripture is fascinating, and that the Scripture is God's absolute truth and Israel is the north star of what is soon to happen.

However, you need to be born again before you can truly understand Scripture. That's because God wrote them. The scriptures are spiritual, therefore, being Born again is the prerequisite for every blessing of God. Sometimes folks do not hear me the first time so here it is again, Born again is the prerequisite for every blessing of God.
Here is a link for the directions on how to be born again,
https://donoterr.wordpress.com/how-2-b-born-again/

Isaiah 13: 6-22 is about a future event called the "Day of the Lord" (verses 6 and 9). That day will be a day of horror, and therefore you do not want to be here when it happens, (Joel 2).

To keep things relatively easy to understand
I have put quotes in ORANGE.
Verses from Isaiah chapter 13 are in BLUE.
Verses from other parts of Scripture are in RED
Isaiah 13:12 
I will make a man more precious than fine gold; even a man than the golden wedge of Ophir.
This is a poetic way of saying that when the DAY OF THE LORD happens many people will die.

THE DAY OF THE LORD will be a time when everyone who is not on the Antichrist's side will live in terror. There will be many natural disasters (see the next verses), as well as reptilian like gangs having the intent to kill and ruin everything in their path as they swarm across nations. Gangs made up of those like ISIS or Pol Pot or Idi amin they will have absolutely no mercy as they plunder and murder. They will truly be children of Satan. Moreover, Lucifer will howl in delight as they do his bidding.

The antichrist and his followers, whose intense desire to eliminate followers of the Lord Jesus, will bring all rebels into subjection to a "kinder gentler world" dominance. The stated goal will be world peace, and they will kill all who resist.

May I continue that thought by saying that the peace loving liberals that we know today, if they could, they would kill every Christian and every conservative.
Liberals think they can bring in a world of peace without the KING OF PEACE, Jesus Christ, they think that the only thing stopping world peace is dull witted Christians and ill-bred political conservatives. Eliminate them and the liberals will rule the world. God will help them out (Thessalonians 2:7)

Isaiah 13:12 is about the decimation of humanity. That decimation will happen in the last 3 1/2 years of the tribulation. That is when God's full wrath will be poured out.
Revelation 9:15-18

At Christ's breaking of the fourth seal (Revelation 6:7-8), fully one-fourth of the earth's population will be destroyed. In Revelation 9:15, 18, one third of the remaining population of the earth will be destroyed at the blowing of the sixth trumpet. Combining those two catastrophic events, and using today's figures of 7 billion as the earth's population, in excess of 3.5 billion people will lose their lives in the space of seven years. That is catastrophic, unprecedented loss of human life!

Therefore I will shake the heavens, and the earth shall remove out of her place, in the wrath of the LORD of hosts, and in the day of his fierce anger.

The heavens in the above are a picture of the earth in space.

Genesis 1:1 In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
GENESIS 1:1 and Isaiah 13: 13
Both refer to the earth as it appears from space.

Isaiah 13: 14,
it shall be as the chased roe...

It shall be as the hunted gazelle: The picture of God’s judgment, upon both Babylon and the world in general, is unrelenting. It is like one of the nature movies where the hunted gazelle is overtaken by the lion, and it utterly consumed. There is no escape from God’s unrelenting judgment.
If you take comfort in Jesus, remember that this is the same unrelenting judgment that was poured out upon Him on the cross. In this picture from Isaiah, Jesus was the hunted gazelle, and willingly made Himself so!
Source is unknown
Isaiah 13:14
as a sheep that no man taketh up
Sheep are defenseless. If someone doesn't come to aid and protect them then they are doomed to destruction. In this verse, no one is available to help them.

READER IF YOU ARE BORN AGAIN, PAY ATTENTION.
You are a sheep. That is now your spiritual nature. God wants you to have the temperament of a sheep. A sheep is a humble animal by nature and not a roaring lion or a laughing baboon. Sheep are peaceful, they are loyal to their owner and smart enough to know who their protector is. Sheep never get angry.
Christian you are a sheep and you ought to study the Bible to find out EXACTLY what that means. Hint: read the gospels.

Jesus came as a sheep. However, after His resurrection His sheep nature changed into the wrath of the Lamb (Rev 6:16).  the Lord Jesus is described as a ferocious sheep in Revelation 6:16-17, and in Revelation 19:16 Jesus Christ becomes KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS.

Revelation 6:16-17
And said to the mountains and rocks, Fall on us, and hide us from the face of him that sitteth on the throne, and from the WRATH OF THE LAMB:
Rev 6:17 For the great day of his wrath is come; and who shall be able to stand?

... every man turn to his own people, and flee every one into his own land.

Those in Babylon, yet future, will flee as they see destruction coming. Those who do not flee will be sorry that they didn't.

Isaiah 13:15
Every one that is found shall be thrust through; and every one that is joined unto them shall fall by the sword.
The Jews are still His people and payday is coming for those Muslim nations that detest Israel and want to annihilate her. And that goes for all nations including the United States of America.
Psalm 137:8
O daughter of Babylon, who art to be destroyed; happy shall he be, that rewardeth thee as thou hast served us.

Happy shall he be, that taketh and dasheth thy little ones against the stones.

I think we ought to just believe God and stop being His protector. By that I mean the Scriptures say what they say. God did destroy the whole world in Genesis six along with every baby and "goody two shoe" along with it. If you are a sinner who has turned your back to Him who proved His love for you at Calvary then you are on the angry side of God (John 3:36). So go ahead, keep mocking Him, and see what happens. If not here then there

Think about this passage about Babylon's destruction as found in
Isaiah 47:9-14
But these two things shall come to thee in a moment in one day, the loss of children, and widowhood: they shall come upon thee in their perfection for the multitude of thy sorceries, and for the great abundance of thine enchantments.

Isaiah 13:16
Their children also shall be dashed to pieces before their eyes; their houses shall be spoiled, and their wives ravished.

Hosea 10:14-15
Therefore shall a tumult arise among thy people, and all thy fortresses shall be spoiled, as Shalman spoiled Betharbel in the day of battle: the mother was dashed in pieces upon her children. 
Hos 10:15 So shall Bethel do unto you because of your great wickedness: in a morning shall the king of Israel utterly be cut off.

Nehemiah 3:10
Yet was she carried away, she went into captivity: her young children also were dashed in pieces at the top of all the streets: and they cast lots for her honourable men, and all her great men were bound in chains.

Barnes commentary reads:
Their children also shall be dashed to pieces - This is a description of the horrors of the capture of Babylon; and there can be none more frightful and appalling than that which is here presented. That this is done in barbarous nations in the time of war, there can be no doubt. Nothing was more common among American savages, than to dash out the brains of infants against a rock or a tree, and it was often done before the eyes of the afflicted and heartbroken parents. That these horrors were not unknown in Oriental nations of antiquity, is evident. Thus, the Psalmist implies that it would be done in Babylon, in exact accordance with this prediction of Isaiah; Psa_137:8-9 :
O daughter of Babylon, who art to be destroyed; happy shall he be, that rewardeth thee as thou hast served us. 
Psa 137:9 Happy shall he be, that taketh and dasheth thy little ones against the stones.
